title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Senate Fauci hearing is a bunch of gum flapping. Schumer claims Fauci has never spoken without Trump lurking over his shoulder. Dems pitch universal basic income: $2K a month for everyone. Citizens of California, Pennsylvania opening up in defiance of Democrat governors. Rand Paul to Fauci: you're not the end-all. Transcripts show CrowdStrike found no evidence the Russians hacked the DNC server. No talk at hearing of the danger of opening too late? Was the point of shutting down to flatten the curve or flatten the U.S. economy? Fauci leaked his testimony to New York Times. Are we opening too late? The unproven claim that Russians hacked the DNC was basis for entire Russia meddling investigation. Ken Starr and Brit Hume on Obama. The coup against Trump is still ongoing, transferred now from Russia to coronavirus.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Red states vs. blue states. Blue state govs want to ruin the economy, keep us closed through the election. Dems calling Trump Herbert Hoover. Rand Paul vs. Fauci. Tim Scott: We see out to flatten the curve, not prevent all deaths. Callers want Trump to push back against the doctors. Debbie "Blabbermouth" Schultz's IT guy. Rudy thinks Barr will indict Comey. Blue state governors counting on red states bailing them out, looking for massive federal bailouts. Media blames Trump for new coronavirus infections.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Wall-to-wall media coverage of Fauci warnings at hearing, media fully invested in economic collapse. Blue state governors want economies wiped out, blame the virus. Trump hits back at CBS News provocateur of Chinese decent, media calls him racist, misses the point of Trump's view on China. Caller on flu vaccine. Fauci thinks death count is low. Newsweek piece on Biden. Biden says media should vet Tara Reade. Caller on CDC death toll. Dr. Birx disputes Elizabeth Warren on daily deaths. Negative stories on Dr. Fauci are swept away.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
